Hi, Guys:
=A0=A0=A0 I'm a newbie of Heritrix user. I want to use Heritrix a=
s a data scraper to extract data with some specified rules. My question is =
how to achieve this? I tried to run heritrix under eclipse, but i find i ca=
n't add module in the "Modules" tab when i was trying to create a new crawl=
 job. Any one knows what's the problem? And , is there any good information=
 extraction module for Heritrix available?

=A0=A0 Thanks so much!

Kai
